summary: REQ-5 and REQ-6 appear to be implemented: the Cash App modal amount is set to "$45" and preorder wording is present; App.tsx is described (in the diff-provided summaries) as showing price $45, a Preorder badge, and a "Preorder Now" CTA. The diff also includes additional UI/theming changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded product image gallery interactions (navigation arrows, image indicator dots, thumbnail selector) beyond the requested price/preorder text updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to update price text and add preorder labeling/CTA wording; it did not request new gallery navigation UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/style changes (monochrome streetwear theme, Tailwind token customization) beyond the requested price/preorder updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request any styling/theme overhaul; only text/label changes were required.
